name: glx

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Shim package for the GLX library.

dependencies.name: libglx
dependencies.description: Placeholder for external OpenGL libraries from hardware vendors

dependent_to.name: geant4
dependent_to.description:
Geant4 is a toolkit for the simulation of the passage of particles
through matter. Its areas of application include high energy, nuclear
and accelerator physics, as well as studies in medical and space
science.

dependent_to.name: mesa-demos
dependent_to.description: This package provides some demo applications for testing Mesa.

dependent_to.name: paraview
dependent_to.description:
ParaView is an open-source, multi-platform data analysis and
visualization application. This package includes the Catalyst in-situ
library for versions 5.7 and greater, otherwise use the catalyst
package.

dependent_to.name: vtk
dependent_to.description:
The Visualization Toolkit (VTK) is an open-source, freely available
software system for 3D computer graphics, image processing and
visualization.

dependent_to.name: dislin
dependent_to.description:
DISLIN is a high level and easy to use graphics library for displaying
data as curves, bar graphs, pie charts, 3D-colour plots, surfaces,
contours and maps.

dependent_to.name: freeglut
dependent_to.description:
FreeGLUT is a free-software/open-source alternative to the OpenGL
Utility Toolkit (GLUT) library

dependent_to.name: mesa-glu
dependent_to.description: This package provides the Mesa OpenGL Utility library.
